DdMdConfigIo Class Reference
ConfigIos

Detailed Description

Native / default format for configuration files.

DdMdConfigIo is a ConfigIo that implements the default configuration file format for ddSim.

Definition at line 28 of file ddMd/configIos/DdMdConfigIo.h.

#include <DdMdConfigIo.h>

void readConfig ( std::istream &  file,
MaskPolicy  maskPolicy 
) [virtual]

Read configuration file.

This routine opens and reads a file on the master, and distributes atom data among the processors.

Parameters:
fileinput file stream
maskPolicyMaskPolicy to be used in setting atom masks

void writeConfig ( std::ostream &  file) [virtual]

Write configuration file.

This routine opens and writes a file on the master, collecting atom data from all processors.
